CustomField.description: By default, if this is empty, AI Companion will use the url of the named credential "mc-backend" (API Name mc_backend). You can set this field if a different URL is needed for your installation
CustomField.inlineHelpText: By default, if this is empty, AI Companion will use the url of the named credential "mc-backend" (API Name mc_backend). You can set this field if a different URL is needed for your installation
CustomField.label: CopadoGPT backend URL
